StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiterHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RecruiterID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT rh.[RecruiterHistoryID], rh.[RecruiterID], rh.[OrgUnitID], rh.[BilletID], rh.[BilletBeginDate], rh.[BilletEndDate], psrOrgRss.Descrip.on as PSRSS, psrOrgRs.Descrip.on as PSRS, psrOrgRegion.Descrip.on as REGION FROM [PSR].[dbo].[RecruiterHistory] rh LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgRss ON orgRss.[Rss] = rh.[OrgUnitID] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] psrOrgRss ON psrOrgRss.[PSROrgUnitID] = orgRss.[Rss] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] psrOrgRs ON psrOrgRs.[PSROrgUnitID] = orgRss.[Rs] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] psrOrgRegion ON psrOrgRegion.[PSROrgUnitID] = orgRss.[Region] Where [RecruiterID] = @RecruiterID AND (psrOrgRss.PSROrgUnitID IS NOT NULL OR rh.BilletID = 99)
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT rh.[RecruiterHistoryID], rh.[RecruiterID], rh.[OrgUnitID], rh.[BilletID], rh.[BilletBeginDate], rh.[BilletEndDate], NULL as PSRSS, psrOrgRs.Descrip.on as PSRS, psrOrgRegion.Descrip.on as REGION FROM [PSR].[dbo].[RecruiterHistory] rh INNER JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgRs ON orgRs.[Rs] = rh.[OrgUnitID] INNER JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] psrOrgRs ON psrOrgRs.[PSROrgUnitID] = orgRs.[RS] INNER JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] psrOrgRegion ON psrOrgRegion.[PSROrgUnitID] = orgRs.[Region] Where [RecruiterID] = @RecruiterID AND orgRs.Rs IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY rh.[BilletBeginDate] DESC
